user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding a comfortable and supportive bra that accommodates my size, allowing me to feel confident and active without discomfort.
purchase_reason: The primary reason for my purchase was the need for comfort and support, especially given my size. I was looking for a solution to the discomfort caused by traditional bras, which often hurt my shoulders and breasts. The product's lightweight and flexible design, along with the wide tank style straps, directly addressed my concerns. The emotional relief of finally finding a bra that fits well and allows me to feel confident and motivated to leave the house was a significant factor in my decision.

My decision to purchase this item was based on the expectation of good support and coverage during workouts. However, the experience was disappointing due to the sizing issue, which made me feel uncomfortable. I relied on the product description that promised a secure fit, but the reality did not meet my expectations, leading to frustration.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value items that are designed for specific needs, such as work-related safety features in footwear or clothing that accommodates my body shape. I appreciate when products are made from quality materials that enhance comfort, like soft fabrics and tag-free designs. Additionally, I tend to favor items that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike products that come with defects, such as holes or poor sizing, as well as those that do not fit as expected, which can lead to discomfort or inconvenience. Overall, I look for reliable, well-constructed items that meet my practical needs without compromising on comfort.

conversation.content: I want to find a comfortable and supportive bra that accommodates my size, allowing me to feel confident and active without discomfort. within my expected price range: [13.94, 35.25]
What specific features are important to you in a bra to ensure both comfort and support while being active?

I generally prefer bras that offer good support with comfortable straps that don't dig into my shoulders. A bra with a flexible and lightweight design would be ideal to ensure I can be active without feeling restricted. Additionally, a bra with a secure fit and coverage is crucial for me to feel confident and comfortable during various activities.

Item No.3 : Item Title: <Exquisite Form 5100531 Fully Wireless Cotton Back & Posture Support Bra> / Item ID: B000E0V532 / Price: $18.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Since 1945, we at Exquisite Form have made it our signature mission to design lingerie for you, the real woman who comes in all shapes and sizes. We\'ve understood for a long time that full-figured women "need a fuller bra, not a bigger bra." That\'s why we\'ve designed our FULLY bras to have targeted innovative features, like powernet support frames, extra support undercups, and stretch sides. Available in extended sizes, our FULLY collection features wireless and underwire bras, longlines, posture bras, minimizer bras, bras with lined cups, padded straps and everything in between. Whether you need a fuller fit or more support, you\'ll find a FULLY bra to fit your needs. In every stitch, there is a promise of fit, durability, and quality. A promise we\'ve kept for over 70 years.']
